mapper.select: SELECT notice_num AS noticeNum, title, content, regdate, chdate, view_count AS viewCount FROM notice ORDER BY regdate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT notice_num AS noticeNum, title, content, regdate, chdate, view_count AS viewCount FROM notice WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY regdate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, content, regdate, chdate, view_count) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{regdate}, #{chdate}, #{viewCount})
